TopicTitle: Question: How many people build stuff for friends?

Articles.Content:
Hi all

This question occured to me today, as yesterday a steam friend was complaining about not being able to go into space or orbit, so I built him a quickie 3 man ship that was big enough to get into orbit (actually during its final flight test , it made it to Jool , then ran out of fuel while trying to raise the PE out of Jool's atmosphere )

How many other folks make either basic ships or even full blown interstellar explorer class ships for friends who need a hand with KSP?

Boris
I don't know anyone IRL that plays, so no. Maybe I need to upgrade my friends.

I don't know anyone IRL that plays, so no. Maybe I need to upgrade my friends.

Sadly same situation here
I know one that I do help.

The only time I've ever built anything in KSP with anyone else in mind in real life wasn't really "for" them so much as to compete against them, the crafts in question being refuel-capable Kerbal Mobility Units (i.e. a small lander thingy with a command seat) for use on the Mun.

I supposed that makes the answer "not me".

If I had a friend who wanted that to happen I probably would, but I don't
I haven't, but mostly because I haven't been asked. I know a couple people that play and occasionally one of them will send me a craft file or screenshot and ask what I think...
